name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - trimipramine
title: Trimipramine cost per 1000 patients
openc_numerator_name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - trimipramine
why_it_matters: Trimipramine is an older tricyclic antidepressant. The cost has increased significantly recently,
and there are newer, cheaper alternatives are available, which are
recommended by NICE in preference to tricyclic antidepressants.
